channel.title: Crowns for mods & admins
channel.description:
My playerrights have been set, I can do admin commands but when I speak I don't have a gold crown next to my name :P I am using PainZone server.
Also, admins have to use the developer console to do commands but that's annoying how do I get rid of that? I thought of searching files for the sentence it prints about please use the console instead and delete the code but I'm not sure if that's the only code that disables you from using normal :: commands.
Thanks!

item.title: Crowns for mods & admins
item.dc:creator: @JohnH JohnH
item.description:
@JohnH wrote:

My playerrights have been set, I can do admin commands but when I speak I don’t have a gold crown next to my name I am using PainZone server.

Also, admins have to use the developer console to do commands but that’s annoying how do I get rid of that? I thought of searching files for the sentence it prints about please use the console instead and delete the code but I’m not sure if that’s the only code that disables you from using normal :: commands.
